name: @ui-schema/system
description: System lib for schema based Validators and UI/Form generators
author: Michael Becker <michael@bemit.codes>

scripts.dtsgen: tsc -d --emitDeclarationOnly --pretty && node ../../tools/merge-dirs.js build/dts build && rm -rf build/dts && rm -rf build/**/*.test.* build/**/*.mock.*
scripts.__release: cp package.json build/ && cp package-lock.json build/ && cp README.md build/ && npm publish build
